attributes.action: make all homes more energy efficient
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Landlords should be made responsible for making rented accommodation more enegy efficient.  It is often the poorest in society who have to live in rented accommodation; having neither the financial means, nor the legal right to make alterations to a property they live in.  Thus the person(s) who own(s)  the property should be responsible for making the property more energy efficient for their tenants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
